segments.text: From where I am, the kitchen looks busy yet serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult focuses on drying that single plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel works diligently, but the sink betrays her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, water pouring over the edge relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It soaks the floor, forming a dangerous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already wet, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes pile neatly on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a lovely garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Low plants border a tidy walkway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the cookie jar tempts the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He balances on the two-step stool, which tilts backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar is bold and sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates, arm up for her portion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the fall that might come next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a snapshot of innocence meeting peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
